feed.title: pyLoad Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for pyLoad: pyLoad 0.4.6
entry.content:
Changelog

  • Huge amount of bugfixes
  • Integration of the ultra-lightweight webserver bjoern
  • IPKG package for most routers and NAS
  • Little improvements for CLI and Web UI
  • Mirror detection within packages
  • Multihoster plugins (real-debrid.com, rehost.to, etc.)
  • pyload-cli package (without GUI) for Debian
  • Some new plugins (x7.to, wupload.com, etc.)
  • Support Rhino as JavaScript engine

entry.title: New release for pyLoad: pyLoad 0.4.7
entry.content:
Changelog

  • CLI file-checker
  • Dropped GUI (since no one maintaining it)
  • Internal optimizations and fixes
  • New API
  • New documentation
  • Package summary in Web UI
  • Swedisch translation

entry.title: New release for pyLoad: pyLoad 0.4.8
entry.content:
Changelog

  • Fixed download chunks on Windows
  • GUI is working again, but may be unstable
  • Improved download performance for high bandwith connections
  • JSON-API, usable by external applications (e.g. FlexGet for automatic RSS feed downloading)
  • Many new plugins (by @zoidberg10)

entry.title: New release for pyLoad: pyLoad 0.4.9
entry.content:
Changelog

  • Fixed various encoding issues
  • Many other fixes
  • Rewritten Unrar plugin
  • Some new plugins

entry.title: New release for pyLoad: pyLoad 0.4.20
entry.content:
Changelog

  • Interactive captcha support
  • New WebUI themes: modern and pyplex
  • Unicode filenames support finally fixed
  • Fixed Unicode parsing of Content-Disposition HTTP header
  • XDCC download refactored and refined
  • Many many more bugfixes
